PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-15591999-09-140,  LAB,  ,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the FAIR WAGES AND HOURS OF LABOUR REGULATIONS which establish new wage survey methods, allow for the adoption of current market-determined provincial wage rates and hours of work standards, define the terms "director" and "inspector", expand on the kinds of discrimination that are prohibited, eliminate residency requirements and update terminology.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1999-0362 Publication Date: 1999-09-29
